content.label: (Deleted review)

I agree w some others here, it‚Äôs become more difficult and a lot less fun. Ive reloaded the game a few times to try the update and can‚Äôt get past first two sections. I have spent too much time gently maneuvering one item ‚Äîthat I was able to work before, but now ‚Äî get nothing.  

Perhaps they should offer an easier version for those who would otherwise get stuck and give up.
Otherworldly. Among the most inventive and unique experiences on iOS!
This was/is an amazing game. Seems like u were adding a lot of new content but that stopped a year ago. Are u working on a new game? (Yes please)
add more levels and itll be 6 stars

Just wish there was more!getting it! I've played games for much longer spans of time that I can barely even remember. But I know that I will remember vignettes for a long time to come because of how unique and well done it is. I hope the developer makes more games, but if they don't I'm happy to have this gem on my phone.
I love the game with all the stuff to do make a vignette 2 that be cool please make another one

This game is one of a kind. It‚Äôs a short for a puzzle game, but really well polished and fun to explore. The graphics look amazing and the music is really mellow and relaxing. It‚Äôs not especially challenging, but that‚Äôs perfectly ok - it‚Äôs more about the experience and interacting with every item than the puzzle itself.  It took me about 3 hours to fully complete the game, and I think it was worth every dollar spent. 

Real games are getting to be pretty hard to find these days on the App Store, with the pay-to-win and freemium games dominating the mobile industry. I was lucky enough to find this gem and I recommend it to anyone who wants to try something new. Big thanks to the devs, I had a lot of fun exploring your game! The effort you put into the game really shows :)
This game was so satisfying to play and complete! By the end I was very involved in the ‚Äústory.‚Äù The little animations really make the game so fun. Thank you for making this!

The game is great. I really wish I knew more about the creation of it. There‚Äôs nothing else like it. And the music is super cewl. It‚Äôs been stuck in my head recently for some reason even though I played this around 7-8 months ago.
Amazing game. One of the coolest puzzle games I‚Äôve ever played

Every time I play this game I‚Äôm always amazed by how many possibilities there are and the intricacy of this game it amazes me how many ways you can change something into something else. To me there is no better time consumer then this game. I wish I could describe this game but it is so hard to explain all the details. I wish I could rate this game 7 out of 5
I was skeptical at first but it is wonderful. It‚Äôs fun, it‚Äôs makes you wonder what‚Äôs next.
Really hoping for new maps in the future because this was such a cute and quirky game. I loved it! Some parts were challenging, but not unsolvable. Very different game, fantastic.

title.label: How to do this gem justice?

content.label:
In the game, there are few (if any, I‚Äôve not completed) words in this game.
As such I‚Äôm not sure I can say anything that will convince you how good it is. At least  imho.
There is no way a still image, video or description can accurately express the beauty that is this game. You just have to try it.
A silent, stylistic perspective-driven mystery that hints at a whole much bigger than the sum of its parts.
I downloaded but kept putting off playing. Now it might be my favorite experience from the App Store (calling it merely a game is selling it short)

Well, since the game thrives without spoken or written language, I should follow suit and just shut up and let you play.

Bravo, devs!
Nice game, super fun, but kinda short and not worth paying for
This game is so boring ! Do not buy this game and waste money. It does nothing.it does not have instructions.it is so hard.I say get rid of this game right now!

After playing this game, I feel torn because I didn't enjoy it, but I can tell the developers worked really hard on it. The visuals and music are fun--I really liked the color palettes and the artwork itself. However, I'd get frustrated a lot trying to find new objects because as I explored, objects kept turning into ones that I'd already discovered. So I was constantly undoing and redoing with no forward progress. If you like easy going games that involve visual rewards and exploration, you might like this. I prefer more strategy and less finicky swipe mechanics.
The nonsensical objects combine perfectly with the wacky music to create a surreal experience as the ordinary becomes weird. Reminds me of ISLANDS: Non-Places, which is a strong recommendation.

I agree with folks who want a better guide to the puzzles. Or else there‚Äôs still a glitch or two. When you get to the scroll you can‚Äôt make all the potential transformations that appear to be available and there‚Äôs no where else to go that I can see. Tried every angle but no way forward. Ditto for the lockets and the cards‚Äî no way to move the game along. A fun game that turns very boring/frustrating, I am ready to banish it from my iphone.
Such a cool game, and there are lots of secrets to be found.üßê it‚Äôs the best kind of digital toy.

This game is a bit pricey for only about 2-3 hours of gameplay, but it‚Äôs totally worth it. It‚Äôs so much fun messing with the objects and seeing where each will lead, especially since there are no instructions or explanations to guide you. It‚Äôs a great game to beat and then watch your friends try out, since now you know how to beat it and they don‚Äôt. I also love all the little easter eggs and two secret links that you can get by putting all the puzzle pieces together. My only concern is that I want this game to be longer. I could go for hours and hours turning objects and doing cool little things, and this sort of feels like a teaser or demo of a full game. While I really do enjoy this game and give it 5 stars, I still beat it wanting more, maybe more secrets, more objects, or, once you get all the keys, an entirely new world of objects is opened. Granted, that would be doubling the game size, but it would make the game SO much better because I never get tired of the intriguing concept.
The Music And Colors Are Very Vibrant And I Love That! And How The Objects Transform Into Other Objects Are Amazing! Thank You For Creating Such A Wonderful App!

I found this game years ago and ever since I have come back to it to find new things to discover. I love this game, it has the most unique art style and game features with a fitting soundtrack. If you want a delightful puzzle game please get this!!

I don‚Äôt write reviews for apps like ever...
But I‚Äôve been looking for a game on the iPhone like this forever, it‚Äôs calming and so clever. I love Easter eggs and this game has a few of them (; love the mystery and the interaction with the object. Pleaseeee update with more phases.

title.label: Played till I couldn‚Äôt play anymore

content.label:
(I had to look up how to spell Ouija board and my entire review deleted üôÑ stupid word) So first of all I regret buying this game yesterday as it became so addicting that I put my homework off until 11 PM, it‚Äôs that good. At the time of writing, I only have the last secret in the spooky world to get, but I‚Äôm having trouble... so SPOILERS AHEAD

So the bowl & pestle you use to make the color scheme change 3 times becomes a voodoo doll, mine currently has a knife stabbed into it whenever I get to its screen, and I think you have to get back to the pestle from there because the ouija board‚Äôs final stage shows knives pointing to a hole (not to mention the secret‚Äôs card shows a knife stabbed into said hole)... BUT getting back to the pestle has been a FREAKING ordeal, I‚Äôve spent the last 30 minutes trying to line everything up perfectly because the menu where you see which objects become which objects lists it as a reversible change and because it‚Äôs a dead end shape. And before this review I watched a YouTube video where a guy got back to the pestle in mere seconds (I added another 5 minutes trying to follow what he did exactly to no avail). It‚Äôs a great game in my opinion (hence my 5 stars), but it felt disappointing not being able to experience everything because of a glitch. 

Edit: to elaborate on the problem I experienced, when I make one of the feet disappear, the other‚Äôs outline is always visible, I‚Äôve never been able to make both outlines disappear fully

2nd edit: decided to open the game for the first time in a while and the doll transition works fine now, I don‚Äôt know what I did different but hey, my completionist mindset has been satisfied üòÅ
nothing is real

absolutely adore this game and its creative thinking, but there is one glitch for me where i put the correct sequence in for the trumpet but it does not unlock the seventh secret (i looked at a walkthrough)

This games was a Total Disappointment!!! I can‚Äôt believe I even spent money on it now. No free test mode, no instruction menu on what to do, and no rewards for completing levels are just a few of the problems with this game. I bought it because of a high rating. I‚Äôm not sure why anyone would give it positive reviews, it only positively sucked. I‚Äôd ask for my money back if I could so I‚Äôll settle for this 1star rating. I would have put 0 stars but it wasn‚Äôt an option üí©

At first, I was skeptical on whether this was a game worthy of me purchasing. I looked at a few reviews and decided to buy it, it was only 0.99 when I bought. I am truly amazed at how beautifully put together this is. I would definitely recommend this to short puzzle people.

Did some YouTube searches of gameplay prior but I was sold even then, the game is mind boggling, Tripp‚Äôs, but easy enough so that you don‚Äôt get frustrated, and calming.

The puzzles and secrets leave you wishing and wanting more after you figure out a new combination, since it‚Äôs all based on perspective.

Short but fun. Personally worth the $3. Especially with the update.

If you like spatial/physical type puzzle games with hidden secrets and unexpected elements, this game is the perfect choice. I loved the rooms, the simple graphics, and the fun game interactions. The spooky room was my favorite.
You should make more levels and stuff to turn into because this game is really fun and I'm sad that it's so short
You think because it looks snazzy you can get away with this much mystery meat navigation? Get over yourselves and explain the game to new players or suffer the dreaded one star.

title.label: It's working great now after earlier problems.

content.label: Very clever game so far. I apologize to the developers for an earlier, unfair negative review.

I love the game, and especially the idea of being able to create stuff from completely unrelated items (i.e., a tv from a pan), but it is a little bit short. Of course, I'm not complaining too much, because at only $0.99 it is a steal!

title.label: Lovely design. No idea what im doing.

content.label:
Design and gameplay is so amazing. Concept is great. Tons of content. 

I just wish there was a bit more text about what is going on - can‚Äôt tell how to progress and why there are different collections. I feel like I start the game over for each time I open it. I can tell the figuring out the menus and stuff is sort of part of the game experience but it‚Äôs not as intuitive as it could be - iconography and progression is still confusing.

This is a great game.  It reminds of some of the puzzles I solved when playing the Myst/Riven games of the 90s.  Well worth the cost.  It may take some time at first to understand what you are trying to do/accomplish in the game.  Be patient and you‚Äôll be rewarded.  The game can be a bit frustrating at times but it‚Äôs very ascetically pleasing and gratifying when you discover a new object or unlock a secret within the game.  It‚Äôs almost as if the whole game is finding Easter egg after Easter egg.
This game is very fun and entertaining. It's so simplistic but yet brings so much complexity. If you like figuring puzzles out on your own, this is a great game for you!!
I am having a lot of fun with the new update but I can‚Äôt get to find the skull with the gem eyes in the witches hut and I don‚Äôt know what to do can someone tell me what to do

This game is amazing and I‚Äôve finished lost of the frames, except the last one which I‚Äôm not quite sure how to get started with. It‚Äôs the skull one or ‚Äúspooky update‚Äù and I‚Äôm not sure how to start using it and I‚Äôve looked online how to
The visuals and colors were stunning and the gameplay was challenging but still fun. It is a little short so I hope more gets released soon
This is the best dream I ever had
It appears to be impossible to switch from the voodoo doll back to the mortar and pestle.

title.label: Fun puzzle game that‚Äôs easy to get lost in

content.label: It‚Äôs easy to lose time swiping and turning the shapes. I love that they keep adding levels, making it totally worth the cost.
The chest won't open after putting in the last key. I can turn it around, but it won't open no matter what I do.

The game looks and sounds great but I couldn‚Äôt make much progress as I couldn‚Äôt sort out how to get back to where I had last left off when loading it for a 2nd time. I was frustratingly tapping on its random assortment of non-cue-giving icons to try and find my way back to the last ‚Äúpuzzle‚Äù I had completed to no avail.

There is a bug where after I played it I couldn't get back in the witch lair?? I tried several times restarting the game but it didn't work :( I do hope you fix it as this one of my most favorite games. Good luck! I was using an IPad Air 2 if you were wondering.

This game is great. I bought it last night and played till I beat it. It is a little short but it's so much fun. Kinda hard to explain what type of game it is, it was just really unique. You twist and turn the object to make the colors form into different objects. There's also little secrets to find. It was relaxing and clever and just an all around cool game. Hoping they add to it. Give it a shot.

Edit: Unfortunately after the new update the game has become unplayable. The chest in the very beginning won‚Äôt even open to allow access to the game.

There‚Äôs already problem I‚Äôve run into. After playing in the witche‚Äôs hut and accidentally clicking into the witch‚Äôs frame and looking at the key then out to the chest, it assumes I‚Äôve already gotten the new key and does the whole sequence of making a new one; then the chest doesn‚Äôt even open, just makes the unlocking sound it did but without the key even on screen.
